snippet: At least a dozen protesters were injured in clashes with riot police after a Ukrainian court on Friday convicted three men of plotting to topple a statue of Vladimir Lenin in 2011.
abstract: At least a dozen protesters are injured in clashes with riot police in Kiev after a Ukrainian court convicts three men of plotting to topple a statue of Vladimir Lenin in 2011.
lead_paragraph: At least a dozen protesters were injured in clashes with riot police after a Ukrainian court on Friday convicted three men of plotting to topple a statue of Vladimir Lenin in 2011.

headline.main: New Clashes Erupt in Ukraine After Trial
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: New Clashes Erupt After Trial
